name: Music Game (Arcus, daniel michaeloudis)
description:
Basics {

Magic player in forest with villages and castles. You have to make your player level up to be better.

}

Story {

The main player is semi-magical, and can do some small things, but meets other wizards and gets trained to be a better wizard.

You are in a forest, and you walk around for a bit along a path towards a small village named 'Luding' (The people of learning)

}

Characters {

          Player:

              Any name (default = Felix)   (Choose look)

          Other characters:

              Villain      - Pravum    (Black robe, Green eyes)

              Mentor    - Captiosus (Dark blue, large beard, Stereotypical hat)

              Others    - Lacerto  (Green scaly cape, Fast)

                    - Pravum    (Black robe, Green eyes)

                     - Bovino    (Slow, White with black spots robe)

           }

Spells {

Teleport       - Statim Movere    - All

          Fire              - Advocignus       - All

          Float            - Volitus     - All

          Ground        - Advopetrus     - All

          Ice               - Advofrigius      - All

          Speed         - Acelarus     - Learn from Lacerto

          Slowness    - Otrisum       - Learn from Bovino

          Wind           - Advocaelius      - All

          Knock-back - Rurus            - Learn from Pravum

          Pain               - Nocerus          - Only bad

          Time             - Tardius     - Easter egg

          Kill               - Occiderius       - Only bad

}

Quest {

          Learn spells from mentor and other wizards (In order as displayed).

         

          Help around the village:

              Farming

}
